1.「究極の一皿を 作ること……\n それは もはや 目標などではなく\n 心の底か:
"Creating the ultimate dish...is no longer a
goal, but something instinctive that I seek from
the bottom of my heart."

171.この姿になると お菓子作りに目覚め\nぺったんぺったん生地を こねるべく\n各地:
When it awakens, it apparently wants to make
sweets and begins lurking in front of cutting
boards, hoping to knead lots of dough.

252.この姿になると 野外で\n究極のカレーを食べるべく\n各所の野営地を 回るらしい:
They travel to various settlements around the
world, looking for the ultimate curry to eat
outdoors.

309.この姿になると 道路のわきで\n身体を クネクネさせながら\nヒッチハイクせずに:
They can't help but try to hitchhike on the side
of the road, their bodies shaking as they go by.

381.この姿になると 各地にいる\nご老人と のんびり\n語りあいたく なるらしい。:
They just want to relax and talk with old folks
who come from all over.

435.この姿になると 考古学に目覚め\n古い歴史を持つ遺跡に\n行きたくて たまらなく:
They have an irresistible urge to show interest
in archaeology and visit ancient historical
sites.

500.この姿になると お姫様気質となり\n安心安全な 場所から 優雅に\n海を見つめて:
They develop a princess-like temperament,
yearning to elegantly gaze at the sea from a safe
and secure spot.

571.この姿になると パカラパカラと前進し\nゾンビ系の魔物に 正々堂々と\n一騎打ち:
They want to boldly challenge zombie-type
monsters to a fair one-on-one combat.

645.この姿になると 雨に当たりたくなり\n常に雨天の地域を探すも そんな場所は\nな:
They love the feeling of rain and search for
areas where it always rains, but since such places
don't exist, they visit the bottom of waterfalls.

732.いい感じのまな板は レンダーシアにある。\nそんなウワサを どこからか聞きつけ\:
The perfect cutting board can be found in
Lendersia. They heard such rumors from somewhere
and continue searching for the right one.

821.究極のカレーには レンダーシードを\n隠し味に使うとよいとの ウワサを信じ\nレ:
It's said that Lendersia Seeds contain a hidden
flavor to make the ultimate curry. Believing in
that rumor, they made their way to Lendersia.

901.ヒッチハイクは 日中にやるものだという\n信条からか だいたい 日が出ている時間:
Because of their creed that hitchhiking should be
done during the day, they usually show up in
Lendersia when the sun is up.

984.一脈 通じるものがあるのか もっぱら\n勇気の民のおじいちゃん のもとにばかり\:
They say that they only visit the old man of the
people of courage, wondering if there is
something that resonates with them exclusively.

1055.古い遺跡を求め 行きついた先は\n中央の 大きな大陸。\nそこで歴史ロマンを 肌:
While searching for old ruins, they came across a
vast central continent. There, they can
experience a historical romance firsthand.

1126.レンダーシアの海岸地帯で\n何を思って 海を見つめ続けるのか\nそれは彼女にしか:
They say that only she knows what she is thinking
about as she continues to gaze at the sea in the
coastal area of Lendersia.

1197.レンダーシアには ゾンビ系の強者たちが\n集まるという 情報をもとに 各所を\n:
They travel around Lendersia with their horse,
Bomber, based on reports that it's home to some
of the most powerful zombies.

1289.いい感じに 雨のような水しぶきを\n求めた結果 たどり着いたのは\nレンダーシア:
They say that seeking the refreshing spray of
rain-like water led them to a remote area in
Lendersia.

1361.「自分の やっていることこそが\n 真の モグラたたきなんだぞ！ っていう\n:
"What I am doing is the true whack-a-mole! With
that unwavering belief, I will keep hitting
them!"

1445.「今のところ いちばん しっくりくる のは\n パンがおいしい 村の家にある\n:
"So far, the one that worked best for me has been
a cutting board in a village house where the
bread is delicious."

1520.「ワルドの香辛料に リャナのスープ\n ローヌの米俵……と思ったら\n なんだよ:
"I thought it was Wald spices, Lyana soup or bags
of Rhone rice...but it turns out it's just a
bundle of hay!"

1598.「日光が 目にしみるから\n サングラスは はずせないのさ。\n ワイルドに の:
"I can't take my sunglasses off or else the sun
would fry my eyes. Gotta ride on wild, ya know!"

1660.「落ち着ける場所で のんびりと\n 熱いお茶を 飲みながらの語らいは\n えもい:
"There is something very special about chatting
over a cup of hot tea in a relaxing atmosphere."

1740.「街道の遺跡に 海岸の遺跡\n 文明の異なる ふたつのピラミッド。\n われの:
"Ruins of a highway, ruins of a coast, two
pyramids of different civilizations. My
historical curiosity is insatiable."

1814.「ああ いとしの おさかなさん。\n どうして あなたは そんなにおいしそうなの:
"Ah, beloved fish. Why do you look so delicious?
Please my stomach..."

1903.「ハイヨ～ ボンバ～\n 目指すは内海の 中央にある島！\n 大丈夫！ お前なら:
"Okay～ Bomber～ We're going to an island in the
center of the inland sea! Don't worry! You can
make it across the water!"

1971.「あめ あめ ふれ ふれ みなさんが～♪\n みつけてくれて うれしいな～\n:
"Everybody, rain, rain, come down, come down～♪
I'm so glad that I've been found～
My red umbrella of gratitude abound～♪"

2303.「いつか スイの塔をピカピカに\n おそうじする夢がありまして そのための\n:
"I have a dream to clean Sui Tower to a shine
someday, and I'm training myself to be strong
enough to do it."

2702.「あわよくば セクシーショットを……などとは\n みじんも思わず。ただ純粋に 美:
"I don't even think about taking a...sexy shot if
possible. I just want to capture a hairdresser's
best and brightest moments in a photo."

2886.この姿になると 各領界にある\nほこらの ひんやりした場所に\nこもりたくなるら:
They prefer hiding in cool places, so the shrines
in each of the five realms are a perfect spot to
chill out.

2946.この姿になると ご飯に合いそうな\nおかずを 探すべく\n各領界の酒場に 出没す:
They frequent the taverns of each realm, seeking
out the perfect dishes to eat with rice.

3009.この姿になると それなりに安全な場所で\n人の形をしたものに 数学の個人授業を\:
Their mission is to give math tutoring lessons to
those who resemble humans in generally safe
places.

3098.この姿になると 肉をおいしく\n調理できる場所を 求めて\n各地の気に入った場所:
They travel around to their favorite places in
each region in search of a place where they can
cook their meat deliciously.

3166.この姿になると いつか大量の稲を刈り取るため\nまずは 高台から辺りをながめて:
They look out over the area from high ground in
order to find land suitable for harvesting large
amounts of rice.

3249.この姿になると 火の勢いが\n強くなりそうな場所に\n行きたくなるらしい。:
They want to go to a place where the flames will
burn quite strongly.

3300.この姿になると 自身をキンキンに\n冷やせそうな 水場を求めて\nあちこちを さ:
They wander around in search of a place with
water where they can cool off.

3366.この姿になると サーカスの興行で\n各領界の 過酷な場所を目指し そこの魔物たち:
They go to the harshest places in each realm as a
circus act, and they want to show their tricks to
the monsters there.

3450.冷たいクリームで できているため\n暑さが苦手で 炎の領界にだけは\n絶対に 行:
They do not like the heat because they are made
of cold cream and would never want to go to the
Fire Realm.

3519.水につかると フニャフニャになりそうなので\n水の領界にだけは 行かないでおこう:
They made up their mind not to go to the Water
Realm because they seem to become soft when
soaked in water.

3597.燃えて 灰になってしまいそうなので\n炎の領界には 近づかないようにしようと\n:
They calculate their movements carefully, as
getting too close to the Fire Realm would burn
them to ashes.

3674.調理方法は 特殊な花の香りを つけてから\n高く寒い場所で カチコチに冷やし\n:
Their cooking method is to add a special floral
aroma to the meat, freeze it solid in an extremely
cold place, then roast it over a hot flame.

3754.見る場所すべて 稲作には適さない土地で\nもういっそ 眼前に見えている でかい塔:
All the land they see in the area is unsuitable
for rice cultivation and are thinking of growing
rice in a greenhouse in the big tower near them.

3847.結局のところ そんな条件を満たすのは\n炎の領界ぐらい だったらしく\n他の領界:
As it turns out, the Fire Realm seems to be the
only one that meets that criteria, as it is not
seen in the other realms.

3985.そもそも まともな水場なんて\n氷の領界と 水の領界ぐらいにしか無く\n他の領界:
The only decent places with water are in the Ice
Realm and Water Realm, as they are not seen in
the other realms.

4059.陰気な場所を好み とても丈夫な骨ゆえに\n炎熱などの環境変化にも 余裕で耐えられ:
They prefer gloomy places, and their strong bones
can withstand environmental changes like extreme
heat, but they hate sacred places full of light.

4164.「氷の領界のほこらにある 氷柱は\n とても冷たくて いちばん居心地がいいね！\:
"The icicles in the shrine in the Ice Realm
are the coldest and most comfortable! However...
the shrine in the Storm Realm is not so nice."

4264.「カーラモーラ村の酒場には おかずがない。\n みんなが飲んでいる あのお酒は:
"There are no side dishes at the tavern in
Carlamora Village. That alcohol everyone is
drinking must be made from rice. Right?"

4360.この姿になると お風呂が大好きになり\nお風呂を求めて 五大陸の町のどこかに\n:
They love baths, and are said to appear somewhere
in one of the towns on the five continents,
slipping around to find one.

4437.この姿になると 丸いこうらのように\n性格も丸くなり のんびりと\nおだやかな:
Like a round shell, it has a rounded personality,
and it is said that it makes people feel relaxed
and calm.

4508.この姿になると 料理がしたくて\nたまらなくなってしまい 思わず 五大陸の\nお:
They feel an overwhelming need to cook, and
unknowingly intrude the kitchens of castles
located in the five continents.

4591.この姿になると 美しい被写体を\n探さずには いられなくなり 被写体を求めて\n:
They can't help but look for beautiful subjects,
and their travels in search of subjects has led
them to a camp.

4680.この姿になると 無性に色々なモノを\nたたきたくなってしまうそうだが\nたたかれ:
They have an inexplicable urge to hit everything
and everyone, but it doesn't really hurt all that
much.

4760.この姿になると 周囲を\nおそうじして ピカピカにしようという\n使命感が 芽生:
They develop a sense of duty to clean up their
surroundings and make everything sparkle and
shine.

4825.「キミは なかなか賢そうな顔立ちをしているね。\n では 女神像くん よく聞きた:
"You've quite the intelligent look. Now, listen
to me, Goddess statue... How can I calculate the
volume of this church...?"

4914.「この肉の調理で 一番きついのは\n 間違いなく 影の谷で 花が咲くのを\n ひ:
"The most difficult part of cooking this meat is
without a doubt waiting patiently for the flowers
to bloom in the Valley of Shadow."

4992.この姿になると 心にも身体にも\nチカラがみなぎり 無性に\nすもうを とりたく:
Their mind and body become filled with energy,
and all they can think about is wanting to
practice sumo wrestling.

5057.「毒の大地に 全部海水 荒れた嵐の大地と\n いくらなんでも これはちょっと厳し:
"Land of poison, all seawater, land of raging
storms, it's a bit harsh no matter how you look
at it. If that's the case, maybe in that tower?"

5152.この姿になると キレイな水が無いと\n生きられなくなるため キレイな水を求めて\:
They need clean water to survive, so they fly
from place to place seeking the very cleanest
they can find.

5227.「ここから見える 竜のシルエットは\n 今にも 動きはじめそうで\n 心が 燃え:
"The silhouette of the dragon visible from here
looks like it's about to start moving at any
moment, and my heart is burning with excitement."

5299.素敵な お風呂があるのは\nきっと大きな国に 違いない。\nそんな思いで お風呂:
There must be a wonderful bath somewhere in this
large country. With that in mind, they continue
to search for a bath.

5373.三度の食事より こうら干しが 好きなため\n自然と 太陽の出ている時間帯に\n姿:
Since they prefer a dry shell more than eating
three meals a day, they are said to naturally
appear when the sun is shining.

5441.作る料理のウデ前は 各国の料理長も\n認めるほどで 作る速度も通常の９倍にのぼり:
Their cooking skills are recognized by chefs from
all over, and their cooking speed is nine times
faster than usual, making cooking incredibly fast.

5531.たどり着いたキャンプ地では 見習い美容師たちの\n美しさに心をうばわれ 彼女たち:
At the camp, they are so struck by the beauty of
the apprentice hairdressers that they vow to make
them the subjects of their photos.

5621.モグラの宿命的に 日光が目にしみるので\nもっぱら 夜から朝にかけて\n活動する:
As is the fate of moles, their eyes are sensitive
to sunlight, so they try to be active mainly from
night until morning.

5696.おそうじは 明るいうちからを信条に\nできるかぎり朝から おそうじ開始するよう\:
Although they try to start cleaning as early in
the morning as possible, sometimes they
oversleep.

5783.「ツボから流れ出る 心地よい水が\n ワシのからだを キンキンに冷やしてくれる。:
"The pleasant water flowing out of the pot cools
my body. Ahhh, what a nice stream, Ahhhhhhh."

5872.「ここは 清廉な空気と聖なる光にあふれている。\n お客は……モコフル達か。\n:
"This place is filled with pure air and sacred
light. The spectators are...Fluff Puffs. I might
be purified if I let my guard down..."

5959.五大陸の各地にいる ライバルたちと\n日夜 一緒にケイコしたり おいしい ご飯を:
They deepen their friendship with their rivals on
all five continents day and night by practicing
together and eating delicious food.

6049.「キレイナ水場ヲ求メテ イロイロ回ルウチ\n ウェナ諸島ニ 行キツイタノダ。\n:
"I traveled around looking for a beautiful place
with water and ended up in the Wena Islands. I
love beautiful places more than anything!"

6139.夜行性で キレイな水であれば 塩からい水でも\nイケるクチ。望みの水場を見つける:
They are nocturnal and can live in salty water as
long as it's clean. When they find a desired place
with water, they become happy and the body glows.

6231.「まだまだ ライバルたちには\n 全然かなわないけれど いつかは勝てるように\n:
"I'm still not as good as my rivals, but I will
work hard every day so that I can eventually win
against them!"

6318.「前略 メギストリスの都では どこを探しても\n お風呂が見つからず 悲しみにう:
"In Megistris City, I couldn't find a bath
anywhere, and so I stared at the moat in dismay,
trembling with sadness."

6420.「この姿になると 自分が 恐竜なのか\n ムシなのか アイデンティティに悩むので:
"I often wonder if I'm a dinosaur, or an
insect... I struggle with my identity. Upon
deeper thought, I realize I'm just a Mimicker."
